main_definition: A condominium, commonly referred to as a condo, is an individual residential unit within a building or complex where the ownership of the units varies among residents and shared common areas are maintained collectively.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of real estate property
meanings_and_examples.example: I bought my new condo downtown last month.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Short for condominium, a form of collective ownership with shared common areas
meanings_and_examples.example: Condo fees cover the maintenance and upkeep of the building's common spaces like gyms, pools, and gardens.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A multi-story residential building divided into separate living units owned by individuals
meanings_and_examples.example: The condo I live in has 15 floors with each unit having its own entrance.
